title: Singular Solutions to the Complex Monge-Amp\`ere Equation
abstract:
We present an explicit pluripotential and viscosity solution to the complex
Monge-Amp\`ere equation with constant right-hand side on $\mathbb
D\times\mathbb C^{n-1}\,(n\geq 2)$, which lies merely in $W^{1,2}_{loc}\cap
W^{2,1}_{loc}$ and is not even Dini continuous. Additionally, we exhibit two
families of explicit entire toric solutions on $\mathbb C^n$ with continuous
H\"older exponent $\alpha\in(0,1)$ and $W^{2,p}_{loc}$ exponent $p\in (1,2)$.
